conbody.p: Technicolor DDS is delivered as a single build component, consisting of a dynamically loadable shared library containing all core DDS functionality, with a number of prebuilt utility and demo programs on the supported platforms.

There is usually no need for changing the component. However, there are still some compile/link-time options available for 'tweaking' the behavior somewhat. It is even possible to link statically if there would be a need for it.
